This just in, during the World Cup final match between Argentina and France, Angel Di Maria scored a stunning goal on a counterattack, making it 2-0 for Argentina. The goal was set up by a beautiful pass from Lionel Messi, and France appears to be struggling to keep up with Argentina's impressive play. Many viewers are praising Di Maria's performance and calling the goal a thing of beauty. The defending champions are currently tearing apart France's defense.
